canonicalConstellations.name: Naruto Uzumaki
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Refused to Be Left Behind
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation born from relentless perseverance and the will to never give up, no matter how many times one falls. Its light shines brightest in moments of comeback.

triggerConditions.description: Record 3 consecutive failures followed by a major success (dungeon clear or promotion)
14+ consecutive days of activity without leaderboard interaction or flexing
Clear a dungeon while at 20% or less health/energy

effects.name: ComebackSpike
effects.description: Every 3 sponsored-dungeons, convert one boss bonus into +1 AGI stage-credit

effects.name: PerseveranceAura
effects.description: Small XP bonus during sponsored dungeons (CL √ó 0.5%)

effects.name: NeverGiveUp
effects.description: Chance to get one free retry on failed dungeon (CL √ó 2%)

tasks.name: Comeback Clear
tasks.description: Clear a dungeon after failing it twice before

tasks.name: Give-Back Run
tasks.description: Forfeit loot on a successful dungeon clear

tasks.name: Group Support
tasks.description: Complete a challenge while another player is spectating

canonicalConstellations.quote: I'm not gonna run away anymore... I'm not gonna go back on my word... that is my ninja way!

canonicalConstellations.name: Son Goku
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Breaks His Limit Again and Again
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation representing boundless potential and the constant pursuit of greater heights through rigorous training. Its energy signature spikes during moments ofÁ™ÅÁ†¥ (breakthrough).

triggerConditions.description: Set personal records in 3 separate training cycles within 7 days
Fail a challenge then immediately succeed on retry with 50% better performance
Complete 5+ challenges in a single session

effects.name: LimitBreak
effects.description: Once per sponsored-dungeon, attempt a boss test one stage above current

effects.name: ZenkaiBoost
effects.description: Slightly faster recovery after failed attempts (CL √ó 1%)

effects.name: KamehamehaFocus
effects.description: Reduced form-break chance during critical moments

tasks.name: PR During Pressure
tasks.description: Set a personal record during a dungeon run

tasks.name: Extra Boss Attempt
tasks.description: Attempt a boss stage one level above your current

tasks.name: Repeat Breaker
tasks.description: Break the same personal record twice in a week

canonicalConstellations.quote: There's always someone stronger, that's why you have to keep training!

canonicalConstellations.name: Levi Ackerman
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Stands Alone on the Battlefield
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of surgical precision and flawless execution. It values perfection over power, efficiency over extravagance.

triggerConditions.description: Clear a Promotion Dungeon with zero form breaks, no consumables
5 consecutive dungeon clears with perfect form scores
Achieve a major milestone without any constellation assistance

effects.name: SurgicalFavor
effects.description: Next two sponsored dungeons can convert boss bonus outcomes into +1 INT each

effects.name: PerfectForm
effects.description: Slightly wider form-break tolerance (CL √ó 1%)

effects.name: BattlefieldAwareness
effects.description: Reveals one dungeon requirement before attempt

tasks.name: Perfect Promotion
tasks.description: Clear a promotion dungeon with zero form breaks

tasks.name: Surgical Week
tasks.description: Complete 7 challenges with 95%+ form score

tasks.name: Clean Conversion
tasks.description: Convert 3 boss bonuses in a single session

canonicalConstellations.quote: Make a decision... don't regret it. That's all you can do.

canonicalConstellations.name: Itachi Uchiha
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Bore the World in Silence
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of sacrifice and long-term planning. It rewards those who play the long game, who endure suffering for greater purpose.

triggerConditions.description: Forfeit loot on two consecutive assigned dungeon clears
14+ consecutive days without leaderboard interactions orÁÇ´ËÄÄ (showing off)
Save 3+ dungeon keys without using them for 7 days

effects.name: LongGameFavor
effects.description: Occasionally convert a sponsored challenge clear into +1 VIT

effects.name: SilentEndurance
effects.description: Increased stamina for endurance-based challenges

effects.name: SacrificialProtection
effects.description: Reduced penalty severity from failures (CL √ó 3%)

tasks.name: Sacrifice Twice
tasks.description: Forfeit loot on two successful dungeon clears

tasks.name: Long Quiet Grind
tasks.description: 30 days without leaderboard posts orÁÇ´ËÄÄ

tasks.name: Story Token Exchange
tasks.description: Exchange collected story fragments for SC

canonicalConstellations.quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define reality.

canonicalConstellations.name: Light Yagami
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Sought to Become God
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of brilliant strategy and ruthless efficiency. It values intelligence over strength, planning over brute force.

triggerConditions.description: Clear assigned dungeon with ‚â•30% time/reps reduction through legal optimization
5 consecutive dungeon clears without taking any avoidable damage/penalties
Attempt a promotion dungeon while under-leveled and succeed

effects.name: RuleBendToken
effects.description: One reusable token to reroll assigned archetype

effects.name: StrategicMind
effects.description: Bonus INT XP from optimized clears

effects.name: DeathNoteClarity
effects.description: Reveals dungeon weaknesses before attempt

tasks.name: Optimization Win
tasks.description: Clear dungeon with 30%+ efficiency gain

tasks.name: Strategic Reroll
tasks.description: Successfully clear dungeon after using reroll token

tasks.name: Calculated Gamble
tasks.description: Attempt promotion while 2+ levels below recommended

canonicalConstellations.quote: I am justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one who will become the god of this new world!

canonicalConstellations.name: Ayanokoji Kiyotaka
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Hid His True Depth
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of hidden potential and calculated underperformance. It rewards those who mask their true abilities, who reveal power only when necessary.

triggerConditions.description: Underperform for 4 key-cycles then spike with perfect Promotion/Gravity dungeon clear
Maintain exactly 50-60% performance for 10+ challenges then release 100%
Master a gauntlet stage without ever failing it publicly

effects.name: HiddenReserve
effects.description: Shield one sponsored-dungeon clear from leaderboards

effects.name: PerfectControl
effects.description: First-use penalty-negation on next sponsored-dungeon fail

effects.name: TrueDepth
effects.description: Grant +1 SEN on successful hidden reserve use

tasks.name: Concealed Spike
tasks.description: Spike performance after period of underperformance

tasks.name: Invisible Assist
tasks.description: Help another player without them knowing

tasks.name: Blind Mastery
tasks.description: Master stage without seeing others' attempts

canonicalConstellations.quote: I don't particularly like or dislike anything. If I have to say, I like people who are useful to me.

canonicalConstellations.name: Saitama
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Trained When No One Watched
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of absurd, almost boring consistency. It represents power achieved through simple, relentless daily effort without recognition.

triggerConditions.description: 180 consecutive days of training without skipping, flexing, or leaderboard posting
Master 10+ gauntlet stages with zero excitement or celebration
5+ dungeon clears with 100% performance but zero emotional response

effects.name: MonolithFavor
effects.description: Cosmetic bald aura at higher CL

effects.name: SeriousSeries
effects.description: Once every 30 sponsored-dungeons allow conversion of one boss bonus into +1 STR

effects.name: BoringPower
effects.description: Ignore minor penalties from boredom/fatigue

tasks.name: Invisible Consistency
tasks.description: 100 days without skipping training

tasks.name: No-Flex Run
tasks.description: Complete major milestone without telling anyone

tasks.name: Bare Minimum Myth
tasks.description: Achieve SSS rank with minimal visible effort

canonicalConstellations.quote: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun. I trained really hard, that's all.

canonicalConstellations.name: Eren Yeager
canonicalConstellations.title: The One Who Chose to Move Forward
canonicalConstellations.description: A constellation of relentless forward motion and tragic determination. It represents the cost of freedom and the weight of moving forward at any price.

triggerConditions.description: After 3 auto-forced failures, accept & clear next assigned dungeon
10+ consecutive challenges completed while in severe pain/disadvantage
Sacrifice a constellation sponsorship to achieve a personal goal

effects.name: PersistenceAid
effects.description: First time fail ‚Üí immediate re-attempt with reduced penalty

effects.name: ForwardMotion
effects.description: Gain momentum bonus after consecutive days of progress

effects.name: TitanWill
effects.description: Convert failed dungeon boss bonus into +1 VIT on re-attempt success

tasks.name: After-Fall Rise
tasks.description: Clear dungeon immediately after forced failure

tasks.name: Relentless Push
tasks.description: 10 challenges while under severe debuff

tasks.name: Corruption Bargain
tasks.description: Accept corrupted constellation for power

canonicalConstellations.quote: I keep moving forward... until my enemies are destroyed.

corruptedConstellations.name: Nine-Tails Naruto
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Consumed by Rage
corruptedConstellations.description: Perseverance twisted into obsession, camaraderie into dependency. The light that refused to be left behind now drags others down with it.

effects.name: RageSpike
effects.description: Requires +40% more stage clears for AGI gains

effects.name: DependencyCurse
effects.description: -25% performance when completing challenges alone

effects.name: BerserkState
effects.description: +30% performance but +50% form-break chance

corruptedConstellations.name: Black Goku
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Seeks Erasure
corruptedConstellations.description: Limit-breaking turned to limitless destruction. The pursuit of greater heights becomes an obsession with erasing all that stands in the way.

effects.name: CorruptedLimit
effects.description: Requires +50% more Push/Pull XP for STR gains

effects.name: ZeroMortals
effects.description: No assisted attempts allowed in any challenge

effects.name: DivinePunishment
effects.description: Success grants 2x rewards, failure grants 0x

corruptedConstellations.name: Fallen Levi
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Cuts All Bonds
corruptedConstellations.description: Surgical precision turned to cruelty, perfectionism to merciless judgment. The blade that protected now cuts indiscriminately.

effects.name: SurgicalStrike
effects.description: Any form-break = stage failure

effects.name: IsolationCurse
effects.description: Cannot participate in group challenges or receive help

effects.name: MercilessEye
effects.description: Dungeon requirements hidden until failure

corruptedConstellations.name: Mad Itachi
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Forgot the Purpose
corruptedConstellations.description: Sacrifice without purpose, endurance without goal. The weight borne in silence becomes a crushing burden with no redemption.

effects.name: PointlessSacrifice
effects.description: Reward-forfeits no longer beneficial

effects.name: CrushingBurden
effects.description: Requires +25% more Total XP for VIT gains

effects.name: TsukuyomiTrap
effects.description: +50% time required between challenge attempts

corruptedConstellations.name: Kira (Ryuk)
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Plays God
corruptedConstellations.description: Strategy turned to manipulation, intelligence to god-complex. The Death Note's power corrupts absolutely.

effects.name: GodComplex
effects.description: INT gains halved

effects.name: RyukGamble
effects.description: System injects optional risky challenges with severe penalties

effects.name: AppleAddiction
effects.description: Lose 20% of SC daily unless completing Ryuk's challenges

corruptedConstellations.name: Null Ayanokoji
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Erases Himself
corruptedConstellations.description: Hidden depth turned to emptiness, control to erasure. The perfect tool with no purpose.

effects.name: Emptiness
effects.description: SEN gains slowed (+40% more Core XP needed)

effects.name: FeedbackNull
effects.description: System feedback hidden, causing uncertainty

effects.name: SelfErase
effects.description: 50% chance milestones aren't recorded

corruptedConstellations.name: Garou
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Became Monster
corruptedConstellations.description: Consistency turned to monstrous adaptation, simple power to chaotic evolution. The hero hunter who becomes what he hunts.

effects.name: MonsterCaliber
effects.description: Boss bonuses reduced by 1 tier

effects.name: AdaptivePunishment
effects.description: System adapts to exploit your weakest attribute

effects.name: Monsterization
effects.description: Failures buff next attempt but stack corruption

corruptedConstellations.name: Eren (Rumbling)
corruptedConstellations.title: The One Who Chose Destruction
corruptedConstellations.description: Forward motion turned to indiscriminate destruction, freedom's cost to everyone's cost. The rumbling cannot be stopped.

effects.name: RumblingMomentum
effects.description: Failures stack 30% harsher penalties

effects.name: FreedomTax
effects.description: -15% all resource gains (XP, SC, etc.)

effects.name: TitanCurse
effects.description: Clearing after multiple failures accelerates corruption meter
